ChangeLog:
- Added conjugation of verbs to match the black card. For instance:
    - Before: Remember us. Remember that we once standing AFK in Limsa.
    - Now: Remember us. Remember that we once stood AFK in Limsa.
    - This is implemented with big lists of verbs and not a full language model, so there will be jank
- Added more cards, modified some others
- Fixed the last card of the deck always being skipped
- Added a button to continue the game where you left it. - Added more cards
- Added a button to continue the game where you left it. - Added more cards

- Added a context menu entry so that players can be added from party list or friend list, just right click
- Added game auto save and auto load, so crashes don't cockblock everyone
- Added and updated several cards
- Score is now written after each win
- Added linkshells as usable chat channels
- Fixed pipeline not writing a needed field in the repo.

- Added new cards
- Added to release pipeline
